etymology.interpretation: 燕麦(燕麥) (yànmài, "oats") combined with 粥(粥) (zhōu, "porridge") indicates a type of porridge made primarily from oats, which is widely recognized as oatmeal porridge.

examples.chinese: 我喜欢燕麦粥(我喜歡燕麥粥)。
每天早餐时(每天早餐時)，我都会煮燕麦粥(我都會煮燕麥粥)。
examples.pinyin: Měitiān zǎocān shí, wǒ dōuhuì zhǔ yànmàizhōu.
examples.english: Every morning at breakfast, I always cook oatmeal porridge.

examples.chinese: 冬天来临时(冬天來臨時)，热燕麦粥能驱走寒冷(熱燕麥粥能驅走寒冷)。
examples.pinyin: Dōngtiān láilín shí, rè yànmàizhōu néng qūzǒu hánlěng.
examples.english: When winter comes, hot oatmeal porridge can drive away the cold.
